data.title: Samantha Ruth Prabhu
data.meta_description: Samantha Ruth Prabhu (formerly Akkineni; born 28 April 1987) is an Indian actress who has established a career in Telugu and Tamil film industries.
data.text:
Original Year Release Film title Title of dubbed version Original Language Dubbed version language Role Dubbing artist Dub Year Release Notes 2010 Brindaavanam The Super Khiladi Telugu Hindi Indu Pooja Punjabi 2012 Remade in Kannada as Brindavana (2013) (Hindi dub titled Ghayal: The Power Man) and in Bengali as Khoka 420 (2013) (Hindi dub titled Mere Ustad 420) with Samantha's role reprised by Milana Nagaraj and Nusrat Jahan respectively.
